rules_text:
Whenever you gain life, Starving Crab gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever you lose life, Starving Crab gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
notes:
New card — replaced Vermilla Sentry

A more archetype-focused card

Might want to keep an eye on that bottom trigger in case a free life pay effect goes infinite with this. Even so, I’m not currently too concerned about it.
